name: Agent Unknown
description:
Tips How To Play:

  • press Tab to change mouse sensitivity
  • press "r" to teleport to the last checkpoint

Story:

A Hacker, looking for revenge, hacked a military facility floating in the sky. He managed to change a setting in the main computer and activated the self defense mode of the military skybase. As a result all robots stopped doing their work and activated their weapon systems. Agent Unknown, a robot soldier from another skybase,  has to go in and fix the mess caused by the hacker. The plan is to restart the main computer. This will hopefully cause all the security settings to be reset to their default values saving the facility and restoring order.
